Japan Escorted Cruise | World Travellers New Plymouth - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Japan Escorted Cruise 14 days | Yokohama (Tokyo) roundtrip Experience Japan at its most poetic. Step aboard the luxurious Seabourn Encore where every detail has been designed with elegance and refinement in mind. Witness the fleeting beauty of sakura season from your private veranda, begin your happily ever after amongst the blossoms, and explore Japan’s timeless landscapes. Whether you’re planning a honeymoon, anniversary, or once-in-a-lifetime getaway, this cruise offers an artful blend of indulgence and adventure. This carefully curated cruise begins in Yokohama, the gateway to Tokyo, and voyages to some of Japan’s most iconic ports during Spring. Sakura doesn’t wait. Neither should you. Availability is limited to preserve the intimacy of this exclusive experience, which is hosted onboard by Nicola McLaren from World Travellers New Plymouth. Reserve your place today and embark on a journey the two of you will never forget. Deal Details Travel Dates Cruise departs 16 March 2026 Priced From AU$18,999 per person Enquire Now Experience Japan at its most poetic. Step aboard the luxurious Seabourn Encore where every detail has been designed with elegance and refinement in mind. Witness the fleeting beauty of sakura season from your private veranda, begin your happily ever after amongst the blossoms, and explore Japan’s timeless landscapes. Whether you’re planning a honeymoon, anniversary, or once-in-a-lifetime getaway, this cruise offers an artful blend of indulgence and adventure. This carefully curated cruise begins in Yokohama, the gateway to Tokyo, and voyages to some of Japan’s most iconic ports during Spring. Sakura doesn’t wait. Neither should you. Availability is limited to preserve the intimacy of this exclusive experience, which is hosted onboard by Nicola McLaren from World Travellers New Plymouth. Reserve your place today and embark on a journey the two of you will never forget. What's Included 14 days in a V1 Veranda Suite from AU$18,999* per person, twin share Your cruise fare includes meals, most beverages & entertainment onboard Itinerary Ports and their order are subject to change at the discretion of the cruise line. Day 1 Embark Tokyo, Japan Day 2 At Sea Day 3 Kobe, Japan Day 4 At Sea Day 5 Kagoshima, Japan Day 6 Nagasaki, Japan Day 7 Nagasaki, Japan Day 8 Busan (Pusan), South Korea Day 9 Shimonoseki, Japan Day 10 Scenic Cruising Kanmon Strait Day 11 Hiroshima, Japan Day 12 Beppu, Japan Day 13 Kochi, Japan Day 14 At Sea Day 15 Shimizu, Japan Day 16 Disembark Yokohama, Japan Your Ship: Seabourn Encore Terms & Conditions Fares are cruise only, per person, in twin/double share, based on V1 Veranda Suite. We have a limited number of suites available at this discounted fare. A 25% deposit is required within 5 days in order to confirm a booking. Final payment is due by 3 November 2025. Airfares, transfers and pre/post cruise accommodation is additional. Terms and conditions apply. Contact World Travellers New Plymouth for full details. Experience the world differently.
